Class SctpChannelOption<T>

java.lang.Object
io.netty.util.AbstractConstant<ChannelOption<T>>
io.netty.channel.ChannelOption<T>
io.netty.channel.sctp.SctpChannelOption<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constant<ChannelOption<T>>, Comparable<ChannelOption<T>>
public final class SctpChannelOption<T> extends ChannelOption<T>
Option for configuring the SCTP transport
